publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-470 Joe FitzPatrick: Scottish Football Success—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish national football team on its historic victory against France in the Parc des Princes on Wednesday 12 September 2007; praises the exemplary behaviour of the estimated 20,000 Scottish fans in Paris during the day and throughout the evening, and wishes the team the best of luck for the remaining qualification matches against Ukraine, Georgia and Italy.

S3M-470 Joe FitzPatrick: Scottish Football Success—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish national football team on its historic victory against France in the Parc des Princes on Wednesday 12 September 2007; praises the exemplary behaviour of the estimated 20,000 Scottish fans in Paris during the day and throughout the evening, and wishes the team the best of luck for the remaining qualification matches against Ukraine, Georgia and Italy. Supported by: Cathy Peattie*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Keith Brown*
S3M-470 Scottish Football Success (lodged on 13 September 2007) Jamie Hepburn*, Christine Grahame*
